channel.title: A Black Mesa Tale......Part 2
channel.description:
[i]For those who were forgotten. [/i]
A Black Mesa Tale......Part 2[/SIZE]
Patonki's body was rolled beside Daniel just as Dr. Strangelove had received the results of the Rossman angeogram that he had ordered.. Fortunately, danielsangeo gram came back clean and, thanks to the Rossman company, he had plenty of time to relish in its results. Yes, he had gone Flatline earlier and Triage had all but decided he was dead but obviously they didn't know what they were talking about.
The Shadi looking nurse slipped a new Maxey pad on him, pulled up his Fancy Pants and left the room. Those pants felt sersoft on his injured (rot)(fodder legs and he was glad to have them. That damn Kairouseki motorcycle was the cause of all of this and the Lincoln Conti nental that he thought he could beat across the intersection shouldn't have been there in the first place. Unfortunately, it was and now he's laying in the eastern wing of the Eric Fong Hospital watching a game on TV between a bunch of ridiculous ferrets. With a score of acade365 and Bluemen230 with 2 minutes left there didn't seem much need to continue watching so he switched over to some space science channel talking about CygNuS Ryλn and how it's starting to expand and become TheSuperNova from hell.
Just at that time, PoliceKING CptObvious entered the room. "Just what I need", thought Daniel, some Evil-Police looking dude coming in to ask questions. He was a mankyman6 foot tall or so and as he entered he quickly turned to Bolteh the door behind him. Daniel should have recognized him. He had fought him in international competition years ago and lost.
An expert in both Tae Kwan Do, as well as Kaweebo, CptObvious had defeated both him and that RabidMonkey BahamutBBob years ago in Singapore. That definitely wasn't a good trip. Daniel even lost to russilker The X_Mastershot,_X anaxed induced though he was. It always seemed odd that russilker was never banned for illegal drug use yet Swampfox and calhoun freeman were sent to the BlackMesaResearchFacily years ago for just using ac3d. Funny...they seemed to have just vanished.. .
CptObvious was there because the signature on the drivers license didn't match the Siggs on the hospital admission forms and the hospital's SassyRobot computer kicked it out. Jean, the nurse on duty, had just entered the room when the captain turned to her and said "Jeannotvb y God! I want it quiet in here". Turning towards him she asked "Are you serious or are you Jokerine?" One look towards the captain answered her question. She turned the TV off then on the way out the room said "call me at Nightmare470-1212 if you need anything. then she quickly left the room.
"Ya know" said CptObvious, "TheeGoatPig monster had been seen in the area recenlty. Heard anything about it?"
"No", said Daniel. I don't know what you're talking about.
"Perhaps it's nothing, just local legend I suppose. Kind of like what you were back in Singapore".
Daniel looked at him and immediately recognized who he was. it was a small discrepancy, probably not a problem but at least he knew one thing. Don't mess With the JEW-FRO cause You Gonna Get Raped. This was the man who had beat him, the man who had defeated him and now he realized he was also the man behind the wheel of the Lincoln Conti nental. The same man who wheeled the mangled corpse of Patonki to rest beside him.
He knew he was next...........
A Black Mesa Tale Part 1 [url]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=10751[/url] A Black Mesa Tale Part 2 [url]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=10757[/url] A Black Mesa Tale Part 3 [url]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=11113[/url][/SIZE]

It may be funny if someone make a fighting game like [COLOR=‘Red’]Mesa Kombat[/SIZE] with a full list of characters mentioned here, adding some stupid abilities to each fighter will be funnier.

Would our avatars be our player models? If so, I approve of being a double-bladed lightsaber wielding pony. ^.^

item.title: A Black Mesa Tale......Part 2
item.dc:creator: CPU
item.description:
k3nny1550:

Can I be in Part 3?

I’ll be sure to include you the next time I do one.

CygNuS:

Nicely done. Looks like I’m in space… spaaace!

Hey I just noticed, you aren’t even in there, CPU!
I think you’ve deserved it to include yourself.

Maybe I’ll do that with another moniker I’ve used.

Frozen Cham:

The one who was considered in the first part is neglected in the second one?
I know it hard to mix em all in one post, doesn’t it.

Ya, I was informed that I left a ton of people out and so that was my focus this time.
I’m beginning to believe I should combine the two stories and re-title the thread to “The Never Ending Story”

Maxey:

Of course you had to use a maxi pad joke…

Sorry bout that. Guess I should make up for it next time.

Ryλn:

hahah I chuckled at that one prolly the most.

simply bc it’s clever and somewhat reminded me of Scary Movie 3’s
hilarious racist japanese subtitle scene

Ya, made me think of that and of Tuong Lu Kim, the City Wok Guy, in South Park.

Bluemen230:

Quote:
Originally Posted by CPU
yet Swampfox and calhoun freeman were sent to the BlackMesaResearchFacily years ago for just using ac3d. Funny…they seemed to have just vanished… .

I was hoping lots of members would get that one!

X_Mastershot_X:

Haha well done good man. I liked it much.

I spent some time coming up with a way to use your name! Glad you enjoyed it.

Read full topic
